alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 3:31AM PDT until November 02 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches in the northern Blue Mountains and 4 to 8 inches in the southern Blue Mountains. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon and Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
